Lardzor, please do some minor research before you make such stupid claims.. this game is nothing like FF7 at all.  its a grid/turn based strategy like the old heroes of might and magic games.

im pretty sure it has something to do with the skald unit. i stoped using them because of what rysioxxx said and i havent had a single crash yet.  before i was lucky to get through a battle without it crashing

the problem is: there are some battles later when your opponets will have skalds in their army, and the game will crash, steam issued a fix small 350kb file thats solves it, i wonder is flt is planning on realising an update on this one.

yea, i got my first crash :/ when a skald opponent used a buff, that had an animation like a flag, i killed one of those units buffed and crashed.
Safest workaround, kill that sob asap or use scare spell.
The first valkirie has a treasure trap very powerful, it will kill a lv 1 unit pretty quick
Easiest way to deal with skald's and not crash is magic shackle spell.
